name: Standard Field Sobriety Game
description:
Game made for the Extra Credits Game Jam #6! Play a game where you're a drunk lad wandering around! Try not to trip over anything.

Warning: The alcoholic effects in this game are dramatized for gameplay purposes; It is not recommended to drink as much alcoholic beverage as the playable character, as that it might cause serious long-term harm, and even death. It is important to stay healthy in these dire times. Thank you for reading!

Musician :
